entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1100 when building projects with multiple TargetFrameworks #23306
  • `dotnet` command has been removed from openSuse Leap 15.3 `dotnet-host` package #23304
  • Address obsolete ContentItemGroup.FindItems in PackageValidation #23301
  • `--no-restore false` isn't honored in the `dotnet build` and other commands #23297
    6.0.3xx
  • Provide better experience when the dotnet version installed with VS and the available .NET MAUI version don't match #23295
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.21568.2] GlobalTool trx2junit install failed #23289
  • `dotnet watch` WebSockets port configuration for HotReload #23283

Closed

  • Provide a way to end a hot reload session when using Visual Studio but not using the debugger #23143
  • Is Blazor Hot Report Supported for Visual Studio for Mac ? #22884
  • dotnet publish hangs in Windows for ~10min after completion #22948
    Discussion
  • dotnet-install.sh fails because the download URL returns . #23296

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the same condition we have for net 6 to net 7 #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23286
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update runHelixAndNonHelixInParallel.ps1 #23284
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update Version.Details.xml to account for package renames #23285
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add missing space to dotnet-watch restart always rude edit message #23281
  • Add missing space to dotnet-watch restart always rude edit message (#23281) #23282
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23232
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx] bump the error number for CompressionInSingleFileRequiresSelfContained #22676
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1xx
  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI
  • Patch 1 #21709
    Area-Compatibility
